title: Rocky River Bowling Tour
text:
library(leaflet)
latitude <- 41.4275543
longitude <- -81.892962
loc_url <- "https://therollhouse.com/north-olmsted/"
loc_name <- "RollHouse North Olmsted"
loc_street <- "24488 Lorain Road"
loc_city <- "North Olmsted, OH 44070"
loc_phone <- "(440) 777-6363"
leaflet(height = "300px") |>
  addTiles() |>
  setView(
    lng = longitude,
    lat = latitude,
    zoom = 15
  ) |>
  addMarkers(
    lng = longitude,
    lat = latitude,
    popup = paste(
      sprintf(
        fmt = "<b><a href='%s' target=_blank>%s</a></b>",
        loc_url,
        loc_name
      ),
      loc_street,
      loc_city,
      loc_phone,
      sep = "<br>"
    ),
    popupOptions = popupOptions(closeButton = FALSE)
  ) |>
  addPopups(
    lng = longitude + 0.00005,
    lat = latitude + 0.0011,
    popup = paste(
      sprintf(
        fmt = "<b><a href='%s' target=_blank>%s</a></b>",
        loc_url,
        loc_name
      ),
      loc_street,
      loc_city,
      loc_phone,
      sep = "<br>"
    ),
    options = popupOptions(closeButton = FALSE)
  )
